channel.title: Win32 Graphic Hooks
channel.description:
I haven't been on this forum in a really long time. But I do remember there was some openGL hooking thread.
Wondering if you guys do anything with graphic library hooking?
Just a DX hook I wrote in a few hours with stride/vert logging
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0IN5U.jpg[/img]
Anyone ever looked into .dlls in
C:\Users\xxx\jagexcache\runescape\LIVE C:\Users\xxx\jagexcache\jagexlauncher\bin
Looks at like a lot of nice places to hook
inb4, already posted and discussed hundreds of times

item.title: Win32 Graphic Hooks
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

Got it sort of working. Displaying id values at the feet of every NPC model.

Got projection/view matrices via:

d3dDevice->GetTransform( D3DTS_VIEW, &matView );
d3dDevice->GetTransform( D3DTS_PROJECTION, &matProjection );
d3dDevice->GetTransform( D3DTS_WORLD, &matWorld );
d3dDevice->GetViewport( &mViewport );

Next I think I need to look into the jagex chache, definitely need an easier way to get vert/primitives/stride for game objects

Read full topic

item.title: Win32 Graphic Hooks
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

I haven’t seen anything about DirectX hooking on here yet, and the guy who was working on it at Villavu disappeared
Nice work btw
